      • getIntercepts

        @Nullable
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable float[] getIntercepts​(float lowerBound,
                                                                 float upperBound)

        Returns the number of intervals that intersect bounds. bounds describes a pair of lines parallel to the text advance. The return array size is a multiple of two, and is at most twice the number of glyphs in the the blob.

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - lower line parallel to the advance
        upperBound - upper line parallel to the advance
        Returns:
        intersections; may be null

      • getIntercepts

        @Nullable
public @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable float[] getIntercepts​(float lowerBound,
                                                                 float upperBound,
                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                 @Nullable Paint paint)

        Returns the number of intervals that intersect bounds. bounds describes a pair of lines parallel to the text advance. The return array size is a multiple of two, and is at most twice the number of glyphs in the the blob.

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - lower line parallel to the advance
        upperBound - upper line parallel to the advance
        paint - specifies stroking, PathEffect that affects the result; may be null
        Returns:
        intersections; may be null
